message_1: If you know that 2 is a prime number, what is the remainder of 3^2021 when it is divided by 2?
message_2: Since 3 is an odd number, any power of 3 will also be odd. When an odd number is divided by 2, the remainder is always 1. Therefore, the remainder of 3^2021 when it is divided by 2 is 1.
